text: Two months after the start of a sexual misconduct investigation into the high - ranking music executive Charlie Walk, the president of the Republic Group, the label and Mr. Walk “ have mutually agreed to part ways, ” the company said Wednesday night in a brief statement. Universal Music Group, which oversees the label, declined to comment further on the outcome of the review, which was conducted by an outside law firm. Mr. Walk, who worked with artists including Lorde, the Weeknd and Ariana Grande, and who also appeared as a judge on Fox ’ s singing competition show “ The Four, ” did not immediately respond to a request for comment.
